Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource

Interface Draft

  • public interface Draft
    The drafts service.

    Provides a way to start and resume drafts.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String DRAFTS
      The collection name that contains a player's corresponding public and private draft state.

    • Method Summary

    • Field Detail

      • DRAFTS

        static final java.lang.String DRAFTS
        The collection name that contains a player's corresponding public and private draft state.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @Suspendable
static DraftRecord get​(GetDraftRequest request)
        Gets the public and private state of the draft.

        A public state should be shared with the client. The private state contains all the cards the player actually drew for the draft.

        Parameters:
        request - A request containing the user ID of the player whose draft should be fetched (players only have only draft going at a time).
        Returns:
        The public and private state of the draft. Includes the choices the player has for draft actions.

      • doDraftAction

        @Suspendable
static DraftRecord doDraftAction​(DraftActionRequest request)
                          throws co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution,
                                 java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                 java.lang.NullPointerException
        Choose a hero power or a card action during the draft.
        Parameters:
        request - The appropriate choice given the state of the draft.
        Returns:
        The new state of this draft.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - when an invalid hero or card choice was made despite one being expected.
        co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • retireDraftEarly

        @Suspendable
static RetireDraftResponse retireDraftEarly​(RetireDraftRequest request)
        Quits a draft early.

        If the player has lost fewer than 3 matches with his current draft deck, the player can quit the draft early. The player spends the difference in lives to quit early. If the player has lost 2 times, the player must pay an additional 1 life to retire early.

        Parameters:
        request - The user ID of the player to retire
        Returns:
        Possibly statistics related to the ending of the draft.

      • toDraftState

        @Suspendable
static com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.DraftState toDraftState​(PublicDraftState inState)
        Gets the client's draft state based on the given public draft state.
        Parameters:
        inState - The public draft state.
        Returns:
        A client-ready draft state view.
